column2: dede, 45-54 on Treatment for less than 1 month (Caregiver)
column9: I am concerned about taking this medicine along with plavix

column2: Meekie100, 13-18 Female  on Treatment for 1 to 6 months (Patient)
column9: I had to take this medication for severe conjestion and allergies.. Only problem is that I had the chewable kind and just the taste of medication makes me gag also it made me sooo drowsy that I could barely function at school.

column2: jlwhiteley, 35-44 Female  on Treatment for 1 to 6 months (Patient)
column9: I loved this drug. It worked and relieved sinus pressure and confusion related to sinus pressure! It works better than anything I've ever used. 1 whole chewable made me a little drowsy, but 1/2 was perfect. My only complaint would be cost. $45.00 with insurance for 30 pills.

column2: pearl, 35-44 Female  on Treatment for 1 to 6 months (Patient)
column9: had been having a lot of problems with allergies but took this med in combination with clarinex and have not gotten sick in months. great med!

column2: Shmily, 35-44 Female  on Treatment for less than 1 month (Patient)
column9: I had fluid/infection in both ears and was on my 2nd round of antibiotics - nothing was working. Dr. prescribed this med and within 24 hours of first dose the pressure in my ears began to diminish.  By day 5 my ears were completely normal.  The only side effect I experienced was increased thirst. Great product.!

column2: mj, 45-54 Female  on Treatment for less than 1 month (Patient)
19-24 Female  on Treatment for less than 1 month (Patient)
column9: This drug does a great job at immediately relieving congestion, but that relief seems to only last an hour.  and in the meantime, I feel that it has only made the pressure in my head worse, leaving behind a headache, which then is frustrating, seeing as there is no information as to whether or not it is safe to take basic pain relievers with this medication.  For the most part, this has been very ineffective for me.  I am appreciative however for the attempts made to create a medication that can relieve cold symptoms.

column2: RayeRaye, 25-34 Female  on Treatment for less than 1 month (Patient)
column9: I feel that this drug should be used more in doctor's offices. I took one this morning, so far so good. The chewable taste is not that great!

column2: Ken, 55-64 Male  on Treatment for less than 1 month (Patient)
column9: This medication worked very quickly and effectively for head congestion with runny nose and ringing ears. I highly recommend it.

column2: 45-54 Female  on Treatment for less than 1 month (Patient)
7-12 Male  on Treatment for less than 1 month (Caregiver)
column9: This medication didn't help my child. He has seasonal allergies, however it didn't help him at all. I do not recommend this medication.
